Checkmarx Rule

Source

 CxList methods = Find_Methods();
result = 
	methods.FindByShortName("_wsystem") + 
	methods.FindByShortName("execl") + 
	methods.FindByShortName("execlp") + 
	methods.FindByShortName("execle") + 
	methods.FindByShortName("execv") + 
	methods.FindByShortName("execvp") + 	
	methods.FindByShortName("system") + 
	methods.FindByShortName("popen") + 
	methods.FindByShortName("WinExec") + 
	methods.FindByShortName("ShellExecute");
